author: Jim Meehan
description: Actually, a shade of orange-red rather than green, the name is a reference to the absinthe in this unusual combination of ingredients. The absinthe-rinse is a subtle addition to the Rosy Deacon but propels this classic into a more interesting place.
name: Green Deacon

recipeInstructions.text: MIST chilled glass with spray or rinse of absinthe to coat the inside and set aside
SHAKE other ingredients with ice and fine strain into absinthe-rinsed chilled glass
